Body: Please correct me if I'm wrong but.. is there a voice recorder app that came with the vanilla gingerbread (having no mods and skins of manufacturers)?If so, can anyone be kind enough to share it with me? (The APK) I know there are a lot of apps like that on the play store but I'd still prefer the one straight from the OS itself.
Title: Voice Recorder app on Gingerbread vanilla ROM?

history.Text: Please correct me if I'm wrong but is there a voice recorder app that came with the stock gingerbread? When I say stock, I meant the gingerbread wherein the manufacturers **haven't** added their mods and skins yet.If so, can anyone be kind enough to share it with me? (The APK) I know there are a lot of apps like that o the play store but I'd still prefer the one straight from the OS itself.
